name: submitIntakeAnswers
description: Submit answers from the intake form after collecting them from the user in chat. Use when the user provided mood, product type, fragrance hints and you have runId and funnelId from showIntakeForm.
schema: [{"property":"runId","type":"string","description":"Run ID from showIntakeForm","required":true},{"property":"funnelId","type":"string","description":"Funnel ID from showIntakeForm","required":true},{"property":"answers","type":"string","description":"JSON object: { target_mood, product_type, fragrance_hints }","required":true}]
